text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $36$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $22$ units.
The measure of angle $BCE$ is $30$ degrees.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AD$, $BC$, $DC$, forming a parallelogram $ABCD$.
There are lines $BE$, $CE$, $DE$, forming a triangle $BCE$.
